templates.name: Nginx Web Server
templates.description: Lekki serwer HTTP i reverse proxy
templates.content:
version: '3'
services:
  web:
    image: nginx:alpine
    ports:
      - "80:80"
    volumes:
      - ./html:/usr/share/nginx/html
    restart: unless-stopped

templates.name: MySQL Database
templates.content:
version: '3'
services:
  db:
    image: mysql:8.0
    environment:
      MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD: example
      MYSQL_DATABASE: mydb
      MYSQL_USER: user
      MYSQL_PASSWORD: password
    volumes:
      - db_data:/var/lib/mysql
    ports:
      - "3306:3306"
    restart: always

volumes:
  db_data:

templates.name: WordPress with MySQL
templates.description: Kompletna instalacja WordPress z bazą danych
templates.content:
version: '3'
services:
  db:
    image: mysql:5.7
    volumes:
      - db_data:/var/lib/mysql
    environment:
      MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD: example_root_password
      MYSQL_DATABASE: wordpress
      MYSQL_USER: wordpress
      MYSQL_PASSWORD: example_password

  wordpress:
    depends_on:
      - db
    image: wordpress:latest
    ports:
      - "8000:80"
    environment:
      WORDPRESS_DB_HOST: db:3306
      WORDPRESS_DB_USER: wordpress
      WORDPRESS_DB_PASSWORD: example_password
      WORDPRESS_DB_NAME: wordpress

volumes:
  db_data:

templates.name: PostgreSQL
templates.content:
version: '3'
services:
  postgres:
    image: postgres:13
    environment:
      POSTGRES_PASSWORD: example_password
      POSTGRES_USER: example_user
      POSTGRES_DB: example_db
    ports:
      - "5432:5432"
    volumes:
      - postgres_data:/var/lib/postgresql/data

volumes:
  postgres_data:

templates.name: Portainer CE
templates.content:
version: '3'
services:
  portainer:
    image: portainer/portainer-ce:latest
    ports:
      - "9000:9000"
    volumes:
      - /var/run/docker.sock:/var/run/docker.sock
      - portainer_data:/data
    restart: always

volumes:
  portainer_data:

templates.name: Redis
templates.description: Serwer cache i baza danych key-value
templates.content:
version: '3'
services:
  redis:
    image: redis:alpine
    ports:
      - "6379:6379"
    volumes:
      - redis_data:/data
    restart: always

volumes:
  redis_data:

templates.name: Grafana
templates.content:
version: '3'
services:
  grafana:
    image: grafana/grafana:latest
    ports:
      - "3000:3000"
    volumes:
      - grafana_data:/var/lib/grafana
    restart: unless-stopped

volumes:
  grafana_data:

templates.name: Jupyter Notebook
templates.content:
version: '3'
services:
  jupyter:
    image: jupyter/datascience-notebook:latest
    ports:
      - "8888:8888"
    volumes:
      - ./notebooks:/home/jovyan/work
    environment:
      - JUPYTER_TOKEN=mysecretpassword
    restart: unless-stopped

templates.name: MongoDB
templates.content:
version: '3'
services:
  mongodb:
    image: mongo:latest
    ports:
      - "27017:27017"
    volumes:
      - mongodb_data:/data/db
    environment:
      MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME: root
      MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD: example
    restart: always

volumes:
  mongodb_data:

templates.name: Nextcloud
templates.description: Platforma do przechowywania plików w chmurze
templates.content:
version: '3'
services:
  nextcloud:
    image: nextcloud:latest
    ports:
      - "8080:80"
    volumes:
      - nextcloud_data:/var/www/html
    restart: unless-stopped

volumes:
  nextcloud_data:

templates.name: Traefik
templates.content:
version: '3'
services:
  traefik:
    image: traefik:latest
    ports:
      - "80:80"
      - "443:443"
      - "8080:8080"
    volumes:
      - /var/run/docker.sock:/var/run/docker.sock
      - ./traefik.toml:/etc/traefik/traefik.toml
    restart: always

templates.name: Prometheus
templates.content:
version: '3'
services:
  prometheus:
    image: prom/prometheus:latest
    ports:
      - "9090:9090"
    volumes:
      - ./prometheus.yml:/etc/prometheus/prometheus.yml
    restart: always

templates.name: Elasticsearch + Kibana
templates.description: Platforma do wyszukiwania i analizy danych
templates.content:
version: '3'
services:
  elasticsearch:
    image: docker.elastic.co/elasticsearch/elasticsearch:7.17.0
    environment:
      - discovery.type=single-node
    volumes:
      - es_data:/usr/share/elasticsearch/data
    ports:
      - "9200:9200"

  kibana:
    image: docker.elastic.co/kibana/kibana:7.17.0
    ports:
      - "5601:5601"
    depends_on:
      - elasticsearch

volumes:
  es_data:

templates.name: GitLab CE
templates.content:
version: '3'
services:
  gitlab:
    image: gitlab/gitlab-ce:latest
    ports:
      - "80:80"
      - "443:443"
      - "22:22"
    volumes:
      - gitlab_config:/etc/gitlab
      - gitlab_logs:/var/log/gitlab
      - gitlab_data:/var/opt/gitlab
    restart: always

volumes:
  gitlab_config:
  gitlab_logs:
  gitlab_data:

templates.name: MariaDB
templates.content:
version: '3'
services:
  mariadb:
    image: mariadb:latest
    environment:
      MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD: example
      MYSQL_DATABASE: mydb
      MYSQL_USER: user
      MYSQL_PASSWORD: password
    ports:
      - "3306:3306"
    volumes:
      - mariadb_data:/var/lib/mysql
    restart: always

volumes:
  mariadb_data:

templates.name: Adminer
templates.description: Lekki interfejs webowy do zarządzania bazami danych
templates.content:
version: '3'
services:
  adminer:
    image: adminer:latest
    ports:
      - "8080:8080"
    restart: always

templates.name: phpMyAdmin + MySQL
templates.content:
version: '3'
services:
  db:
    image: mysql:8.0
    environment:
      MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD: example
    volumes:
      - db_data:/var/lib/mysql

  phpmyadmin:
    image: phpmyadmin/phpmyadmin
    ports:
      - "8000:80"
    environment:
      PMA_HOST: db
    depends_on:
      - db
    restart: always

volumes:
  db_data:

templates.name: RabbitMQ
templates.content:
version: '3'
services:
  rabbitmq:
    image: rabbitmq:management
    ports:
      - "5672:5672"
      - "15672:15672"
    volumes:
      - rabbitmq_data:/var/lib/rabbitmq
    restart: always

volumes:
  rabbitmq_data:

templates.name: MinIO
templates.description: Obiektowy serwer plików kompatybilny z S3
templates.content:
version: '3'
services:
  minio:
    image: minio/minio
    ports:
      - "9000:9000"
      - "9001:9001"
    volumes:
      - minio_data:/data
    environment:
      MINIO_ROOT_USER: minioadmin
      MINIO_ROOT_PASSWORD: minioadmin
    command: server /data --console-address ":9001"
    restart: always

volumes:
  minio_data:

templates.name: Vaultwarden
templates.content:
version: '3'
services:
  vaultwarden:
    image: vaultwarden/server:latest
    ports:
      - "8000:80"
    volumes:
      - vaultwarden_data:/data
    restart: always

volumes:
  vaultwarden_data:

templates.name: Home Assistant
templates.content:
version: '3'
services:
  homeassistant:
    image: ghcr.io/home-assistant/home-assistant:stable
    volumes:
      - homeassistant_config:/config
    ports:
      - "8123:8123"
    restart: always

volumes:
  homeassistant_config:

templates.name: Plex Media Server
templates.content:
version: '3'
services:
  plex:
    image: plexinc/pms-docker
    ports:
      - "32400:32400"
    volumes:
      - plex_config:/config
      - plex_transcode:/transcode
      - /path/to/media:/data
    restart: always

volumes:
  plex_config:
  plex_transcode:

templates.name: WireGuard VPN
templates.content:
version: '3'
services:
  wireguard:
    image: linuxserver/wireguard
    cap_add:
      - NET_ADMIN
      - SYS_MODULE
    environment:
      - PUID=1000
      - PGID=1000
      - TZ=Europe/Warsaw
    volumes:
      - wireguard_config:/config
      - /lib/modules:/lib/modules
    ports:
      - "51820:51820/udp"
    sysctls:
      - net.ipv4.conf.all.src_valid_mark=1
    restart: always

volumes:
  wireguard_config:

templates.name: Matomo Analytics
templates.content:
version: '3'
services:
  matomo:
    image: matomo:apache
    ports:
      - "8000:80"
    volumes:
      - matomo_data:/var/www/html
    restart: always

  mariadb:
    image: mariadb:10.6
    environment:
      MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD: example
      MYSQL_DATABASE: matomo
    volumes:
      - mariadb_data:/var/lib/mysql
    restart: always

volumes:
  matomo_data:
  mariadb_data:

templates.name: Gitea
templates.content:
version: '3'
services:
  gitea:
    image: gitea/gitea:latest
    ports:
      - "3000:3000"
      - "2222:22"
    volumes:
      - gitea_data:/data
    restart: always

volumes:
  gitea_data:

templates.name: Zabbix
templates.content:
version: '3'
services:
  zabbix-server:
    image: zabbix/zabbix-server-mysql:latest
    ports:
      - "10051:10051"
    environment:
      DB_SERVER_HOST: zabbix-mysql
      MYSQL_USER: zabbix
      MYSQL_PASSWORD: zabbix
      MYSQL_DATABASE: zabbix
    depends_on:
      - zabbix-mysql
    restart: always

  zabbix-web:
    image: zabbix/zabbix-web-nginx-mysql:latest
    ports:
      - "8000:8080"
    environment:
      DB_SERVER_HOST: zabbix-mysql
      MYSQL_USER: zabbix
      MYSQL_PASSWORD: zabbix
      MYSQL_DATABASE: zabbix
      ZBX_SERVER_HOST: zabbix-server
    depends_on:
      - zabbix-server
    restart: always

  zabbix-mysql:
    image: mysql:8.0
    environment:
      MYSQL_DATABASE: zabbix
      MYSQL_USER: zabbix
      MYSQL_PASSWORD: zabbix
      MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD: example
    volumes:
      - zabbix_mysql:/var/lib/mysql
    restart: always

volumes:
  zabbix_mysql:

templates.name: Emby Unlocked
templates.description: Serwer multimedialny z odblokowanymi funkcjami premium
templates.content:
version: '3'
services:
  emby:
    image: gekomod/emby-unlocked:latest
    ports:
      - "8096:8096"
      - "8920:8920"
    volumes:
      - emby_config:/config
      - /path/to/media:/media
    environment:
      - PUID=1000
      - PGID=1000
      - TZ=Europe/Warsaw
    restart: unless-stopped

volumes:
  emby_config:

templates.name: Jellyfin
templates.content:
version: '3'
services:
  jellyfin:
    image: jellyfin/jellyfin:latest
    ports:
      - "8096:8096"
      - "8920:8920"
    volumes:
      - jellyfin_config:/config
      - /path/to/media:/media
      - /path/to/cache:/cache
    environment:
      - PUID=1000
      - PGID=1000
      - TZ=Europe/Warsaw
    restart: unless-stopped

volumes:
  jellyfin_config:

templates.name: Sonarr + Radarr + Prowlarr
templates.content:
version: '3'
services:
  sonarr:
    image: linuxserver/sonarr:latest
    ports:
      - "8989:8989"
    volumes:
      - sonarr_config:/config
      - /path/to/media:/media
      - /path/to/downloads:/downloads
    environment:
      - PUID=1000
      - PGID=1000
      - TZ=Europe/Warsaw
    restart: unless-stopped

  radarr:
    image: linuxserver/radarr:latest
    ports:
      - "7878:7878"
    volumes:
      - radarr_config:/config
      - /path/to/media:/media
      - /path/to/downloads:/downloads
    environment:
      - PUID=1000
      - PGID=1000
      - TZ=Europe/Warsaw
    restart: unless-stopped

  prowlarr:
    image: linuxserver/prowlarr:latest
    ports:
      - "9696:9696"
    volumes:
      - prowlarr_config:/config
      - /path/to/downloads:/downloads
    environment:
      - PUID=1000
      - PGID=1000
      - TZ=Europe/Warsaw
    restart: unless-stopped

volumes:
  sonarr_config:
  radarr_config:
  prowlarr_config:

templates.name: qBittorrent + VPN
templates.content:
version: '3'
services:
  qbittorrent:
    image: gekomod/qbittorrentvpn:latest
    ports:
      - "8080:8080"
      - "6881:6881"
      - "6881:6881/udp"
    volumes:
      - qbit_config:/config
      - /path/to/downloads:/downloads
    environment:
      - PUID=1000
      - PGID=1000
      - TZ=Europe/Warsaw
      - VPN_ENABLED=yes
      - VPN_TYPE=openvpn
      - VPN_USER=your_username
      - VPN_PASS=your_password
    cap_add:
      - NET_ADMIN
    restart: unless-stopped

volumes:
  qbit_config:

templates.name: Overseerr
templates.content:
version: '3'
services:
  overseerr:
    image: sctx/overseerr:latest
    ports:
      - "5055:5055"
    volumes:
      - overseerr_config:/config
    environment:
      - PUID=1000
      - PGID=1000
      - TZ=Europe/Warsaw
    restart: unless-stopped

volumes:
  overseerr_config:

templates.name: Audiobookshelf
templates.content:
version: '3'
services:
  audiobookshelf:
    image: advplyr/audiobookshelf:latest
    ports:
      - "13378:80"
    volumes:
      - abs_config:/config
      - /path/to/audiobooks:/audiobooks
      - /path/to/podcasts:/podcasts
    environment:
      - PUID=1000
      - PGID=1000
      - TZ=Europe/Warsaw
    restart: unless-stopped

volumes:
  abs_config:

templates.name: Code-Server
templates.content:
version: '3'
services:
  code-server:
    image: codercom/code-server:latest
    container_name: code-server
    ports:
      - "8443:8080"
    volumes:
      - code_server:/home/coder/.local
      - /path/to/projects:/home/coder/projects
    environment:
      - PUID=1000
      - PGID=1000
      - TZ=Europe/Warsaw
      - PASSWORD=yourpassword
    restart: unless-stopped

volumes:
  code_server:

templates.name: Minecraft Server
templates.content:
version: '3'
services:
  minecraft:
    image: itzg/minecraft-server:latest
    container_name: minecraft
    ports:
      - "25565:25565"
    volumes:
      - mc_data:/data
    environment:
      - EULA=TRUE
      - MEMORY=4G
      - VERSION=LATEST
    restart: unless-stopped

volumes:
  mc_data:

templates.name: Gitea
templates.content:
version: '3'
services:
  gitea:
    image: gitea/gitea:latest
    container_name: gitea
    ports:
      - "3000:3000"
      - "2222:22"
    volumes:
      - gitea_data:/data
      - /etc/timezone:/etc/timezone:ro
    environment:
      - USER_UID=1000
      - USER_GID=1000
    restart: unless-stopped

volumes:
  gitea_data:

templates.name: LibreSpeed
templates.content:
version: '3'
services:
  librespeed:
    image: linuxserver/librespeed:latest
    container_name: librespeed
    ports:
      - "8081:80"
    environment:
      - PUID=1000
      - PGID=1000
    restart: unless-stopped

templates.name: Mealie
templates.content:
version: '3'
services:
  mealie:
    image: hkotel/mealie:latest
    container_name: mealie
    ports:
      - "9925:80"
    volumes:
      - mealie_data:/app/data
    environment:
      - TZ=Europe/Warsaw
    restart: unless-stopped

volumes:
  mealie_data:

templates.name: FileBrowser
templates.content:
version: '3'
services:
  filebrowser:
    image: filebrowser/filebrowser:latest
    container_name: filebrowser
    ports:
      - "8082:80"
    volumes:
      - /path/to/files:/srv
      - fb_config:/config
    restart: unless-stopped

volumes:
  fb_config:

templates.name: Heimdall
templates.content:
version: '3'
services:
  heimdall:
    image: linuxserver/heimdall:latest
    container_name: heimdall
    ports:
      - "8083:80"
      - "8443:443"
    volumes:
      - heimdall_config:/config
    environment:
      - PUID=1000
      - PGID=1000
      - TZ=Europe/Warsaw
    restart: unless-stopped

volumes:
  heimdall_config:

templates.name: Guacamole
templates.content:
version: '3'
services:
  guacamole:
    image: guacamole/guacamole:latest
    container_name: guacamole
    ports:
      - "8084:8080"
    volumes:
      - guac_config:/config
    environment:
      - GUACD_HOSTNAME=guacd
    depends_on:
      - guacd
    restart: unless-stopped

  guacd:
    image: guacamole/guacd:latest
    container_name: guacd
    restart: unless-stopped

volumes:
  guac_config:

templates.name: Stirling-PDF
templates.content:
version: '3'
services:
  stirling-pdf:
    image: frooodle/s-pdf:latest
    container_name: stirling-pdf
    ports:
      - "8085:8080"
    volumes:
      - spdf_data:/configs
    restart: unless-stopped

volumes:
  spdf_data:

templates.name: CyberChef
templates.content:
version: '3'
services:
  cyberchef:
    image: mpepping/cyberchef:latest
    container_name: cyberchef
    ports:
      - "8086:8000"
    restart: unless-stopped

templates.name: Uptime Kuma
templates.content:
version: '3'
services:
  uptime-kuma:
    image: louislam/uptime-kuma:latest
    ports:
      - "3001:3001"
    volumes:
      - uptime_kuma_data:/app/data
    restart: always

volumes:
  uptime_kuma_data:

templates.name: Navidrome
templates.content:
version: '3'
services:
  navidrome:
    image: deluan/navidrome:latest
    ports:
      - "4533:4533"
    volumes:
      - navidrome_data:/data
      - /path/to/music:/music
    environment:
      - ND_SCANSCHEDULE=1h
    restart: unless-stopped

volumes:
  navidrome_data:

templates.name: Bitwarden RS
templates.content:
version: '3'
services:
  bitwarden:
    image: bitwardenrs/server:latest
    ports:
      - "8001:80"
    volumes:
      - bitwarden_data:/data
    restart: always

volumes:
  bitwarden_data:

templates.name: Pi-hole
templates.content:
version: '3'
services:
  pihole:
    image: pihole/pihole:latest
    ports:
      - "53:53/tcp"
      - "53:53/udp"
      - "8087:80"
    volumes:
      - pihole_data:/etc/pihole
      - pihole_dnsmasq:/etc/dnsmasq.d
    environment:
      - TZ=Europe/Warsaw
    restart: always

volumes:
  pihole_data:
  pihole_dnsmasq:

templates.name: Authelia
templates.content:
version: '3'
services:
  authelia:
    image: authelia/authelia:latest
    ports:
      - "9091:9091"
    volumes:
      - authelia_config:/config
    restart: always

volumes:
  authelia_config:

templates.name: Wiki.js
templates.content:
version: '3'
services:
  wikijs:
    image: requarks/wiki:latest
    ports:
      - "8002:3000"
    volumes:
      - wikijs_data:/var/wiki
    environment:
      - DB_TYPE=sqlite
    restart: unless-stopped

volumes:
  wikijs_data:

templates.name: RustDesk Server
templates.content:
version: '3'
services:
  rustdesk:
    image: rustdesk/rustdesk-server:latest
    ports:
      - "21115:21115"
      - "21116:21116"
      - "21116:21116/udp"
      - "21117:21117"
      - "21118:21118"
      - "21119:21119"
    restart: always

templates.name: Freshrss
templates.content:
version: '3'
services:
  freshrss:
    image: linuxserver/freshrss:latest
    ports:
      - "8003:80"
    volumes:
      - freshrss_data:/config
    restart: unless-stopped

volumes:
  freshrss_data:

templates.name: Calibre-Web
templates.content:
version: '3'
services:
  calibre-web:
    image: linuxserver/calibre-web:latest
    ports:
      - "8004:8083"
    volumes:
      - calibre_data:/config
      - /path/to/books:/books
    restart: unless-stopped

volumes:
  calibre_data:

templates.name: Tandoor Recipes
templates.content:
version: '3'
services:
  tandoor:
    image: vabene1111/recipes:latest
    ports:
      - "8005:80"
    volumes:
      - tandoor_data:/data
    environment:
      - SECRET_KEY=your_secret_key
    restart: unless-stopped

volumes:
  tandoor_data:

templates.name: Tube Archivist
templates.content:
version: '3'
services:
  tubearchivist:
    image: bbilly1/tubearchivist:latest
    ports:
      - "8006:8000"
    volumes:
      - ta_data:/data
    restart: unless-stopped

volumes:
  ta_data:

templates.name: Ghost
templates.content:
version: '3'
services:
  ghost:
    image: ghost:latest
    ports:
      - "8007:2368"
    volumes:
      - ghost_data:/var/lib/ghost/content
    environment:
      - NODE_ENV=production
    restart: unless-stopped

volumes:
  ghost_data:

templates.name: Trilium Notes
templates.content:
version: '3'
services:
  trilium:
    image: zadam/trilium:latest
    ports:
      - "8008:8080"
    volumes:
      - trilium_data:/home/node/trilium-data
    restart: unless-stopped

volumes:
  trilium_data:

templates.name: BookStack
templates.content:
version: '3'
services:
  bookstack:
    image: linuxserver/bookstack:latest
    ports:
      - "8009:80"
    volumes:
      - bookstack_data:/config
    environment:
      - DB_HOST=bookstack_db
      - DB_USER=bookstack
      - DB_PASS=yourpassword
      - DB_DATABASE=bookstack
    depends_on:
      - bookstack_db
    restart: unless-stopped

  bookstack_db:
    image: linuxserver/mariadb:latest
    volumes:
      - bookstack_db_data:/config
    environment:
      - MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD=yourrootpassword
      - MYSQL_DATABASE=bookstack
      - MYSQL_USER=bookstack
      - MYSQL_PASSWORD=yourpassword
    restart: unless-stopped

volumes:
  bookstack_data:
  bookstack_db_data:

templates.name: Flame
templates.content:
version: '3'
services:
  flame:
    image: pawelmalak/flame:latest
    ports:
      - "8010:5005"
    volumes:
      - flame_data:/app/data
    restart: unless-stopped

volumes:
  flame_data:

templates.name: NocoDB
templates.content:
version: '3'
services:
  nocodb:
    image: nocodb/nocodb:latest
    ports:
      - "8011:8080"
    volumes:
      - nocodb_data:/usr/app/data
    restart: unless-stopped

volumes:
  nocodb_data:

templates.name: Baserow
templates.content:
version: '3'
services:
  baserow:
    image: baserow/baserow:latest
    ports:
      - "8012:80"
    volumes:
      - baserow_data:/baserow/data
    restart: unless-stopped

volumes:
  baserow_data:

templates.name: Appwrite
templates.content:
version: '3'
services:
  appwrite:
    image: appwrite/appwrite:latest
    ports:
      - "8013:80"
    volumes:
      - appwrite_data:/storage
    environment:
      - _APP_ENV=production
    restart: unless-stopped

volumes:
  appwrite_data:

templates.name: Strapi
templates.content:
version: '3'
services:
  strapi:
    image: strapi/strapi:latest
    ports:
      - "8014:1337"
    volumes:
      - strapi_data:/srv/app
    environment:
      - DATABASE_CLIENT=sqlite
    restart: unless-stopped

volumes:
  strapi_data:

templates.name: Umami
templates.content:
version: '3'
services:
  umami:
    image: ghcr.io/umami-software/umami:latest
    ports:
      - "8015:3000"
    environment:
      - DATABASE_URL=postgres://umami:umami@umami_db:5432/umami
    depends_on:
      - umami_db
    restart: unless-stopped

  umami_db:
    image: postgres:12-alpine
    environment:
      - POSTGRES_DB=umami
      - POSTGRES_USER=umami
      - POSTGRES_PASSWORD=umami
    volumes:
      - umami_db_data:/var/lib/postgresql/data
    restart: unless-stopped

volumes:
  umami_db_data:

templates.name: Focalboard
templates.content:
version: '3'
services:
  focalboard:
    image: mattermost/focalboard:latest
    ports:
      - "8016:8000"
    volumes:
      - focalboard_data:/opt/focalboard/data
    restart: unless-stopped

volumes:
  focalboard_data:

templates.name: Vault
templates.content:
version: '3'
services:
  vault:
    image: vault:latest
    ports:
      - "8200:8200"
    volumes:
      - vault_data:/vault/file
    environment:
      - VAULT_DEV_ROOT_TOKEN_ID=myroot
    cap_add:
      - IPC_LOCK
    restart: unless-stopped

volumes:
  vault_data:

templates.name: Keycloak
templates.content:
version: '3'
services:
  keycloak:
    image: quay.io/keycloak/keycloak:latest
    ports:
      - "8088:8080"
    environment:
      - KEYCLOAK_ADMIN=admin
      - KEYCLOAK_ADMIN_PASSWORD=admin
    volumes:
      - keycloak_data:/opt/keycloak/data
    restart: unless-stopped

volumes:
  keycloak_data:

templates.name: Grafana Loki
templates.content:
version: '3'
services:
  loki:
    image: grafana/loki:latest
    ports:
      - "3100:3100"
    volumes:
      - loki_data:/loki
    restart: unless-stopped

volumes:
  loki_data:

templates.name: Grafana Tempo
templates.content:
version: '3'
services:
  tempo:
    image: grafana/tempo:latest
    ports:
      - "3200:3200"
    volumes:
      - tempo_data:/tmp/tempo
    restart: unless-stopped

volumes:

templates.name: Outline
templates.content:
version: '3'
services:
  outline:
    image: outlinewiki/outline:latest
    ports:
      - "8017:3000"
    volumes:
      - outline_data:/var/lib/outline
    environment:
      - DATABASE_URL=postgres://outline:outline@outline_db:5432/outline
    depends_on:
      - outline_db
    restart: unless-stopped

  outline_db:
    image: postgres:13-alpine
    environment:
      - POSTGRES_USER=outline
      - POSTGRES_PASSWORD=outline
      - POSTGRES_DB=outline
    volumes:
      - outline_db_data:/var/lib/postgresql/data
    restart: unless-stopped

volumes:
  outline_data:
  outline_db_data:

templates.name: Mattermost
templates.content:
version: '3'
services:
  mattermost:
    image: mattermost/mattermost-team-edition:latest
    ports:
      - "8018:8065"
    volumes:
      - mattermost_data:/mattermost/data
    restart: unless-stopped

volumes:
  mattermost_data:

templates.name: Rocket.Chat
templates.content:
version: '3'
services:
  rocketchat:
    image: rocket.chat:latest
    ports:
      - "8019:3000"
    volumes:
      - rocketchat_data:/app/uploads
    environment:
      - MONGO_URL=mongodb://rocketchat_db:27017/rocketchat
    depends_on:
      - rocketchat_db
    restart: unless-stopped

  rocketchat_db:
    image: mongo:4.0
    volumes:
      - rocketchat_db_data:/data/db
    restart: unless-stopped

volumes:
  rocketchat_data:
  rocketchat_db_data:

templates.name: Discourse
templates.content:
version: '3'
services:
  discourse:
    image: bitnami/discourse:latest
    ports:
      - "8020:3000"
    volumes:
      - discourse_data:/bitnami/discourse
    environment:
      - POSTGRESQL_HOST=discourse_db
    depends_on:
      - discourse_db
    restart: unless-stopped

  discourse_db:
    image: bitnami/postgresql:latest
    volumes:
      - discourse_db_data:/bitnami/postgresql
    restart: unless-stopped

volumes:
  discourse_data:
  discourse_db_data:

templates.name: Peertube
templates.content:
version: '3'
services:

    ports:
      - "8021:9000"

      - peertube_data:/data

volumes:
